title: Golden Hashes
description: Drift detection anchors for stable upstream provisions. Each entry tracks a specific upstream resource and its expected content hash.

description.description: Human-readable description of the anchored provision

upstream_url.description: URL of the upstream authoritative resource

selector_hint.description: Hint for locating the provision within the upstream page

expected_sha256.description: SHA-256 hash of the normalized upstream content, or 'COMPUTE_ON_FIRST_RUN'

expected_snippet.description: Short text snippet expected in the upstream content
